name: Skewer
description: When you attack and hit with a polearm and either beat the foe's Defense by at least 3 or roll max damage, you may spend 1 MP to inflict Injury.

improvements.name: Deep Impact
improvements.description: You may spend an additional 1 MP to make the polearm become lodged in the wound. The foe's movement is halved until they or another combatant spend a half action to remove it.
